No, I wasn’t able to get a license plate but I saw damage on the passenger side of the white mustang.
It was not my vehicle that was hit, I just saw it happen.
Ok, is it possible if we can get an officer to you to file a report and get information?
Yes I am still in the parking lot.
Thank You. What vehicle are you in and what area of the parking lot should we send the officer to?
I am in a silver dodge [PERSON], I am in the general lot by the recreation center, close to one of the lot entrances. I can stand out by the truck so the officer will see me.
Thank you very much I have an officer enroute to you now
Where exactly in the lot are you?
The best I can describe it as there is a massive tree in the center of the lot, that is where I am.
ok
I can try and turn on my exact location.
I see the officer but he went towards the rec center, I am closer to the street.

response: I have turned on my location sharing, so the officer should be able to find me easily now.
